Wow. I've gotten so much positive feedback about LivePublisher. We’re plugging away at the crowdfunding pitch, and getting ready to onboard i a few more publications in November.

Friday PSA:  "Act As If".  Act as if the money you are spending at your company is in your checking account and not someone else's.  Act as if when you're doing lead generation, the company's future success relies on the quality of the leads you're generating.  Act as if the BANT qualified sales opportunity you just got from marketing has to close this quarter, not next.  Act as if the current features and functionality you're coding in this sprint is holding everyone else up in the company to sell and generate revenue.  Act as if you are the CEO of the company every-single-day and your job performance good/bad determines the outcome of every single employee in the organization.  I'm not talking about just startup ups, I'm talking about every size company globally.
After over two decades in digital publishing and over five years of publishing a magazine, I'm excited to be spinning off the LivePublisher platform we developed for QLife for other publications.
Publisher of Vegas Shade, a socially integrated, all-digital lifestyle and entertainment magazine featuring fabulous Las Vegas.
QLife Magazine is the local LGBTQ publication server Las Vegas, Los Angeles and New York.
VGM is a multi-media technology, events, and marketing company.

QVegas Magazine is the 6th oldest LGBT publication in the US and the largest in Nevada. In January 2015, QVegas transitioned to an all-digital format and is published on Gay.Vegas, in social media, downloadable PDF, and print-on-demand.

Mondays Dark is a non-profit organization that brings Las Vegas perfumers together one night a month to raise money for a different charity each month. I support the organization through social media, planning, marketing and event support.

Schoun Regan
Apple Product Documentation at Apple
February 7, 2008, Russ worked with Schoun in the same group

Russ White is an excellent trainer and speaker. He is engaging, helpful, and able to take very complex subjects, such as WebObjects, Mac OS X Server setup, Xsan administration, and various aspects of managing Mac OS X, and make them easy to understand. He allows the attendees to focus on the material and does not upstage it, rather he intuitively and deftly handles each student's level of comprehension and manages to communicate to that student on that specific level, something that only a few very experienced and competent trainers are able to handle.There is no one that I know of that currently and consistently maintains such a regard for their students. Subsequently, the knowledge passed to each student, which in turn leads to better understanding, greater productivity, and increased revenue, provide an excellent training value for the dollar.Russ is a respected colleague and he has my highest recommendation.

Brad Coughlin
Web Application Developer, UX Engineer, UI Designer
January 15, 2017, Russ managed Brad directly

I met Brad when I first moved to Las Vegas. It was supposed to be one of those quick 30-minute Starbucks meetings that lasted about 3 hours. I couldn't afford to hire him then, but four years later when the opportunity arose, I jumped on it. Brad is an independent worker and a team player. He takes time to analyze the problem before jumping to the solution. He stays focused on the technologies he knows and continually builds his skill set, but is also constantly culling the technology landscape and his network for what's new and promising. Brad is a well rounded full-stack UX developer with graphic design skills and aesthetics that allow him to prototype a finished product.

summary: I am an online publishing professional with more than two decades of experience across many different media and technologies. I currently live in Las Vegas, Nevada where I own and publish QLife Magazine  with my business partner. In addition to our online brands, our business provides digital publishing, social media, event management, guest list management, lead generation, brand development through the same technologies that power our digital properties.
name: Russ White
title: Co-Founder and Co-Publisher at Vegas Shade and QLife Magazine
